SELECT TJ.*, (tj.COUNT_VALUE-tj.FINISH_value) as noFinishValue, CI.ITEM_CODE, CI.ITEM_NAME, SU.REALNAME as jobUserName FROM tb_job TJ LEFT JOIN cd_item CI ON TJ.CD_ITEM_ID = CI.ID LEFT JOIN sys_users SU ON TJ.JOB_USER = SU.ID
AND tj.PURCHASE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND tj.id = #{packageTaskId}
order by tj.job_create_time
